Package gameFiles

Interface Summary
MapElement The MapElement interface can be implemented by any class that wants to be drawn on the GUI in ShippingGame.
 

Class Summary
Circle The Circle class is a graphic class that allows the drawing of circles.
Edge The Edge Class in ShippingGame allows creation of the connections between Nodes that Trucks can Travel along Each Edge is connected to exactly two Nodes, and the getFirstExit() and getSecondExit() methods allow access to these Nodes.
Game The Game Class is the controlling class for the ShippingGame Project.
GUI The GUI Class creates the JFrame that shows the game.
Main  
Manager The Manager Class determines the the behavior of the Trucks.
Map The Map Class is a container for the HashSets of Edges and Nodes that make up the playing field of the game.
Node  
Parcel  
Road  
Score The Score Class is a convenient way to monitor the score of a Game.
Truck  
 

Enum Summary
Truck.Status The Two States that a Truck can be in at any time - either Waiting (staying on its location and awaiting further travel instructions) or Traveling (currently moving from node to node according to its travel instructions).
